wizard.label: Sample size computation for estimating one mean wizard

text.p: This procedure computes the sample size reiquired to estimate the mean of one population using a confidence interval with a given confidence level and error.

page.text: Enter the stadard deviation of the population or an estimate of it.
Enter the confidence level for the confidence interval.
Enter the maximum absolute error for the estimate.
